snippet: Thousands of New Yorkers who supported President Obama’s health plan are finding that their insurance plans are canceled and that they may have to accept inferior coverage.
abstract: Thousands of New Yorkers who supported President Obama’s health plan are finding that their insurance plans are canceled and that they may have to pay more or accept inferior coverage; most are independent practitioners who were part of group plans under informal New York system, but are now considered individuals under Obamacare.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of New Yorkers who supported President Obama’s health plan are finding that their insurance plans are canceled and that they may have to accept inferior coverage.

headline.main: With Affordable Care Act, Canceled Policies for New York Professionals
headline.print_headline: Under Health Law, Independent Practitioners in City Face Canceled Policies

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
